{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15873v1", "title": "A new method for erasure decoding of convolutional codes", "summary": "In this paper, we propose a new erasure decoding algorithm for convolutional
codes using the generator matrix. This implies that our decoding method also
applies to catastrophic convolutional codes in opposite to the classic approach
using the parity-check matrix. We compare the performance of both decoding
algorithms. Moreover, we enlarge the family of optimal convolutional codes
(complete-MDP) based on the generator matrix.", "main_category": "cs.IT", "categories": "cs.IT,math.IT", "published": "2025-04-22T13:18:17Z"}
